property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as Adanto Vanguard is attacking, it gets +2/+0. Pay 4 life: Adanto Vanguard gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Players can't cast spells from graveyards or activate abilities of cards in graveyards. Whenever a creature dies, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let no trace of the vampires' foulness remain."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have two target players exchange life totals.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Church of Dusk teaches there is no gain without loss, no triumph without sacrifice, no drink of exquisite crimson without a dying gasp.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enrage - Whenever Bellowing Aegisaur is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its roaring challenge is punctuated by the slam of its tail on the earth, rousing the herds of the plains.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Whenever Bishop of Rebirth attacks, you may return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the death of the foe lies the resurrection of the faithful."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vampires, the noble class of old Torrezon, are guided by their dual loyalties to church and crown.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target attacking creature. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vampires know blood and the systems that carry it. And they know exactly where to strike to set it free.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The River Heralds carve spells into jade, hoping to steer us from our course. But what right do they have to keep us from that which once was ours?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {W}, {T}: Target attacking Vampire gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike When Emissary of Sunrise enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike {7}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Encampment Keeper: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Paladins of the Sanctum Seeker order are an adventurous lot, venturing into the wilds with monstrous mastiffs at their side.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 2 life: Glorifier of Dusk gains flying until end of turn. Pay 2 life: Glorifier of Dusk gains vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The blood of the enemy is a sacrament. The strength it gives is proof that our cause is just."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double strike Whenever Goring Ceratops attacks, other creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Follow her footsteps and she will show you the way." - Itzama the Crested

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Imperial Aerosaur enters the battlefield, another target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its assistance is unnervingly similar to its hunting technique.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Imperial Lancer has double strike as long as you control a Dinosaur.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Together my mount and I are stronger than either of us apart."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Inspiring Cleric enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Immortal Sun will bring us true eternal life to replace the everlasting shadow of undeath."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ixalan's Binding enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Ixalan's Binding leaves the battlefield. Your opponents can't cast spells with the same name as the exiled card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jace awoke to the certainty that he was lost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dinosaur spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The people of the Sun Empire worship the sun in three aspects. Kinjalli is the Wakening Sun, who created humans from clay and baked them in the sun's warmth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are moments when I feel I could fly like the sunwing. Far away I would soar, but always a golden gale pushes me back." - Huatli

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Legion Conquistador enters the battlefield, you may search your library for any number of cards named Legion Conquistador, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Legion of Dusk sailed from Torrezon in search of glory, riches, and the Immortal Sun.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My lance was once wielded by Venerable Tarrian. In his name and by his might, I cast you down!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: (Transforms from Legion's Landing.) {T}: Add {W}. {2}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Legion's Landing enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink. When you attack with three or more creatures, transform Legion's Landing.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I claim this land in the name of the queen." - Adrian Adanto of Lujio

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nature can't be tamed, but the Sun Empire believes that humans are made stronger when they test themselves against the wild strength of the dinosaurs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one or more nontoken Vampires you control attack, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the rapture of his Blood Fast, he destroyed the navigator's tools and steered the ship to shore by faith alone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Paladin of the Bloodstained enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Closely linked to the Church of Dusk, the paladins of the Bloodstained order are devout to the point of fanaticism.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Pious Interdiction enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life. Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ours is the true and righteous path. You will bow before our might."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may reveal a Dinosaur card from your hand. If you do, you gain 2 life. {3}{W}{W}, Sacrifice Priest of the Wakening Sun: Search your library for a Dinosaur card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pterodon Knight has flying as long as you control a Dinosaur.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To rise like the sun - there is no greater feeling."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the blood of the impure flow through you. Only the blessings of the golden city will purge its acrid taste from your mouth." - High Marshal Arguel

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sun's strength sings in our hearts! I have never been more proud of my home and my people." - Huatli

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A raptor will follow any order as long as that order is "hunt," "kill," or "go for the guts."

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 4 life. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nothing is more sacred than the gift of blood. Blessed are the vein that empties and the heart that is renewed."

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain twice X life. Put Sanguine Sacrament on the bottom of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As the sun sets to make way for dawn, so we turn to darkness to bring about the coming salvation."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile all attacking creatures target player controls. That player may search their library for that many basic land cards, put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. Scry 1. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy the creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who wield the power of the sun protect the Empire from darkness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The invaders cloak themselves in the shadows of dusk. Aerosaurs hide in the brilliance of the noonday sun." - Caparocti Sunborn

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vampires call the gift of flight "exultation." For their enemies, it brings only sorrow.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Slash of Talons deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The amber sun smokes with fury, gazing on foes that gather like ants invading our home. We are ready! Blade and claw strike as one." - Huatli

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance {1}{W}, {T}: Steadfast Armasaur deals damage equal to its toughness to target creature blocking or blocked by it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Like the mighty armasaur, we will defend against all who invade our shores." - Itzama the Crested

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Sunrise Seeker enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Territorial Hammerskull attacks, tap target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the eyes up, it's solid bone and stubbornness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures entering the battlefield don't cause abilities to trigger.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The glorious city of Pachatupa is the center of the Sun Empire, and Tocatli, the emperor's palace, is its glowing heart.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's a Vampire, it gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Feast of Blood sends new life essence flowing through the vampire who partakes, manifesting as even greater strength and speed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Wakening Sun's Avatar enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, destroy all non-Dinosaur creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kinjalli's encompassing rays herald new life in the moment of the sun's dawning." - Chitlati, Lightning Rider

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the ship approached, the jade totem rose high overhead. Power rippled. Eyes of stone glowed and crackled. Out hissed a breath of the world, and a windstorm came alive.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Arcane Adaptation enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures you control are the chosen type in addition to their other types. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hold your fire, obviously." - Captain Brandis Thorn

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless you attacked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While other pirates prowl for treasure, Captain Parrish plunders secrets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{U}: Daring Saboteur can't be blocked this turn. Whenever Daring Saboteur deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Deadeye Quartermaster enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment or Vehicle card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Welcome aboard, mate! You're going to need this."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a Merfolk spell, create a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token with hexproof. (A creature with hexproof can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A visit to the Deeproot Tree and its ancient spring replenishes a merfolk's connection to nature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Pockets full of gold, lungs full of brine.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gets +0/+3 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Seeing the river is not the same as seeing the fish."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying Dreamcaller Siren can block only creatures with flying. When Dreamcaller Siren enters the battlefield, if you control another Pirate, tap up to two target nonland permanents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature with mana value X.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The stronger the will, the more bewitching the song.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Like ribbons of wind and wisdom the coatls fly, twisting mystery into truth, shaping the clouds to suit their inscrutable will." - Huatli

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Fleet Swallower attacks, target player mills half their library, rounded up.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Captain, I think that island is following us."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The elders say that if the intruders discovered the secret of the golden city, it would mean an end to our people."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You might as well try to stop the waterfall."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player this turn, draw a card, then discard a card. −2: Create a 2/2 blue Illusion creature token with "When this creature becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it." −5: Create two tokens that are copies of Jace, Cunning Castaway, except they're not legendary.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spells your opponents cast that target a Merfolk you control cost {2} more to cast. Abilities your opponents activate that target a Merfolk you control cost {2} more to activate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I know these waters better than you know yourselves."

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Pirate. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her song plucks the strings of the storm, shifting wind and storm into a harmony that will carry her ship to safety.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Raid - At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, target opponent mills four cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You won't be needing this. Or this. Or these . . ."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "River and sea, jungle and sky. Water flows freely between the two halves of the world. We are creatures of the water." - Shaper Tuvasa

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's easy to anticipate Captain Storm's orders: take the more dangerous route."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The truth came to Kumena like the Great River's torrent: the only way to keep his enemies away from the hidden city was to claim its power for himself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand. If its mana value was 2 or less, scry 2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the first time in her life, Vraska tried to prevent death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing warms the heart like plunder.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Prosperous Pirates enters the battlefield, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The floating city of High and Dry hasn't yet sunk under the weight of gold, but it's not for want of trying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: River Sneak can't be blocked. Whenever another Merfolk enters the battlefield under your control, River Sneak gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No ripples, no splashes, no warning.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return all nonland permanents target player controls to their owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Carefully following the thaumatic compass Bolas had given her, Vraska blundered straight into the River Heralds' trap.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target artifact or creature on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That's the first time I've seen the ground do the running." - Captain Brinely Rage

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sailor of Means enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the Brazen Coalition, the wheels of business are greased with plunder.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (Transforms from Search for Azcanta.) {T}: Add {U}. {2}{U}, {T}: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature, nonland card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, surveil 1. Then if you have seven or more cards in your graveyard, you may transform Search for Azcanta. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Sunken Ruin houses all the learning of a long-forgotten age.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shaper Apprentice has flying as long as you control another Merfolk.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The River Heralds would wreck a thousand ships to keep intruders from finding the golden city.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Raid - When Shipwreck Looter enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One pirate's wreck is another's reward.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {7}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Shore Keeper: Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Over their long life spans, the larger trilobites accumulate vast treasure troves in their guts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Siren Lookout enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {U}, Sacrifice Siren Stormtamer: Counter target spell or ability that targets you or a creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He's the calm that hides the coming storm.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If a Pirate was exiled this way, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Deception and misdirection are the heart of the pirate's arsenal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A fool's fire is quickly quenched." - Shaper Kumena

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Create X Treasure tokens, where X is that spell's mana value. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Raid - Storm Fleet Aerialist enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only one thing beats the freedom of the sea: the freedom of the sky."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Raid - When Storm Fleet Spy enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They're searching in the same direction we are. And for the same thing, I'll wager."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Storm Sculptor can't be blocked. When Storm Sculptor enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In his hands, the wind can become a weapon or a means of escape.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Tempest Caller enters the battlefield, tap all creatures target opponent controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Watertrap Weaver enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The river is a powerful friend.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Currents are currents, whether in sea or sky."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target Vampire get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Inspiration is red as rubies, flowing like honeyed wine.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 5 or less life, you may transform Arguel's Blood Fast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Arguel's vision led him into the jungles of Ixalan . . .

property.name: Rules
property.value: (Transforms from Arguel's Blood Fast.) {T}: Add {B}. {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: . . . to the lost temple of a bat-god of night, eternal enemy to the Threefold Sun.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Bishop of the Bloodstained enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life for each Vampire you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They shall give us all they have as penance for their resistance. Their ships. Their goods. Their rebellious blood."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {7}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Blight Keeper: Target opponent loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It withers fruit and flesh alike.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Bloodcrazed Paladin enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature that died this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When a paladin undertaking the Blood Fast finally gives in to hunger, the violence is sudden, explosive, and complete.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile up to five target creature cards from graveyards. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put all cards from the pile of your choice onto the battlefield under your control and the rest into their owners' graveyards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. Create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For a price, the floating city of High and Dry offers all the amenities a pirate could want: rest, recreation, and revenge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No lock of iron is a match for Vraska's will of stone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dark Nourishment deals 3 damage to any target. You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Demons lurk in the shadows of ancient ruins, spreading plague and corruption across the land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Raid - When Deadeye Tormentor enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, target opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Despite their noble heritage, the pirates of the Deadeye Fleet are known for underhanded tactics and despicable trickery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}, {T}: Exile two target cards from an opponent's graveyard. Deadeye Tracker explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Tap three untapped Vampires you control: Return Deathless Ancient from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ancient one, we have reached the promised shore. The Immortal Sun is near. Drink and awake."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Desperate Castaways can't attack unless you control an artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A pirate crew without a ship is a crew that will do anything to get one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Dire Fleet Hoarder dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Among the pirates of the Brazen Coalition, the only thing more dangerous than failure is success.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace When Dire Fleet Interloper enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace, deathtouch When Dire Fleet Ravager enters the battlefield, each player loses a third of their life, rounded up.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His fists fume with the decay of death, each strike a plague on the hearts of his enemies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Solitude and starvation are brutal punishments, but even worse is all that time to think.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace Whenever Fathom Fleet Captain attacks, if you control another nontoken Pirate, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a 2/2 black Pirate creature token with menace.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Join me, and take the world for yourself!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Fathom Fleet Cutthroat enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls that was dealt damage this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was a bad evening for you, mate. Now it's chow time for the sharks."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return a Pirate card from your graveyard to your hand, then do the same for Vampire, Dinosaur, and Merfolk.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the battle is over, the bitterest foes at last find common ground.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent discards two cards. Raid - If you attacked this turn, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Kitesail Freebooter enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. Exile that card until Kitesail Freebooter leaves the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control explores, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Shadow birthed it. The moon gave it eyes, and the jungle gave it teeth. But it was Death that taught it cruelty." - Huatli

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Return two target Pirate cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Through your sacrifice of self, you become holy. Through your strength, all will be saved." - From the Rite of Redemption

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink When Queen's Agent enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The soldiers of the Legion of Dusk have come to the colonies at Queen's Bay in search of glory and riches. They are veterans of centuries of warfare, and they thirst for conquest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent discards a card, that player loses 2 life. Raid - At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, target opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One was spared to tell the gruesome tale.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control ten or more Treasures, you win the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Raid - At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to the card's mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") Sacrifice three Treasures: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This scum is barely worth the trouble."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a Vampire you control attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Sanctum Seekers were the first of the knightly orders to cross the sea and are still the most zealous.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Seekers' Squire enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: Skittering Heartstopper gains deathtouch until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It flows like water over the forest floor, as deadly as the swiftest current.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +1/+1 and target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They're so much more willing to parley once they're hanging from a boom by the ankle!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Skymarch Bloodletter enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the perpetual shadowsmoke that hung above the ship, a silent form emerged, lips curled with malice and anticipation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land. Its controller loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What is this foul presence that defies the sun's cleansing rays?" - Itzama the Crested

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top three cards of your library. For each of those cards, put that card into your hand unless any opponent pays 3 life. Then exile the rest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Take my blood if you want. Just don't take my gold!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The clerics known as condemners punish those who do not recognize the righteous authority of the church.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Vicious Conquistador attacks, each opponent loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He is ambitious. Tireless. And utterly ruthless. Ideal for the frontier." - Viceroy Elia Sotonores, report to the queen

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature or planeswalker. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It wasn't long before the taverns of High and Dry were full of whispers about the new captain who could turn a person to stone with a glance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Captain Thorn adds a new ship to his fleet, he gives the crew a simple choice: follow me, or fall in the sea.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Wanted Scoundrels dies, target opponent creates two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Trust me. The reward's not worth it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Captain Angrath cares less about treasure than mayhem. If he can't leave Ixalan, he'll burn the plane down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bonded Horncrest can't attack or block alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You don't tame a horncrest. You convince it that it's easier to destroy something else." - Amautl, knight of Atzocan

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste When Brazen Buccaneers enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Burning Sun's Avatar enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target opponent or planeswalker and 3 damage to up to one target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tilonalli's searing rays carry the spark of life's eventual destruction as all light fades." - Chitlati, Lightning Rider

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Whenever Captain Lannery Storm attacks, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") Whenever you sacrifice a Treasure, Captain Lannery Storm gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{R}: Gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We sail. We plunder. Then we dance."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I knew I should have stayed with the boat. Always stay with the boat!"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What took months for human hands to carve took just seconds for the dinosaur's tail to ruin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn. Dinosaurs you control gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you're in the way of a ceratops charge and you're made of mere flesh and bone, then you're not really in the way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dual Shot deals 1 damage to each of up to two target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Through me the rage of Tilonalli burns twice as bright."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}: Fathom Fleet Firebrand gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As she charges into battle, her arcane tattoos stir and crawl like fiery serpents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fiery Cannonade deals 2 damage to each non-Pirate creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wary of the ferocious dinosaurs, the Legion of Dusk built up the walls of their fort - just in time for the pirates to burn them down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace {7}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Fire Shrine Keeper: It deals 3 damage to each of up to two target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though grimed with the dust of centuries, the ancient shrine was not unguarded.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Firecannon Blast deals 3 damage to target creature. Raid - Firecannon Blast deals 6 damage instead if you attacked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins' fearlessness and diminutive size make them the perfect cannoneers.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sun Empire warriors are taught to emulate the fearless raptors that fling themselves against towers of horn and muscle a hundred times their size.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Headstrong Brute can't block. Headstrong Brute has menace as long as you control another Pirate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Watch your backs, keep your blades at hand, and let the orc go first!" - Captain Brandis Thorn

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target artifact or creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Trapped on Ixalan, the Planeswalker Angrath is the only minotaur sailing the seas. No matter how many ships he captures, he cannot break free.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Storm on the horizon, cap'n!" - Grick Doobin, last words

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Lightning-Rig Crew deals 1 damage to each opponent. Whenever you cast a Pirate spell, untap Lightning-Rig Crew.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A pirate ship in battle is a storm of activity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Makeshift Munitions deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Grease up a firecannon good and proper with dinosaur-liver oil, and it'll shoot just about anything."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These sailors on our shores are like the dinosaurs that plunder eggs from nests. They live on the labors of others." - Itzama the Crested

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dinosaur spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. {T}: Target Dinosaur gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Forward! Let the Burning Sun's light guide you to deserving prey!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace Players can't gain life. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, Rampaging Ferocidon deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All raptors are aggressive, but ferocidons seem to enjoy their prey's pain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enrage - Whenever Raptor Hatchling is dealt damage, create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every little hatchling has a parent's claws to guard it." - Sun Empire saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: Repeating Barrage deals 3 damage to any target. Raid - {3}{R}{R}: Return Repeating Barrage from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only if you attacked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Raid - Rigging Runner enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hook makes him feel brave, and the hat makes him feel fancy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rile deals 1 damage to target creature you control. That creature gains trample until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The enormous can still be at the mercy of the small.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Rowdy Crew enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then discard two cards at random. If two cards that share a card type are discarded this way, put two +1/+1 counters on Rowdy Crew.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins' eager curiosity leads them to scavenging, petty theft, and the rigging of sleek pirate ships. Some stop at scavenging.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land. Star of Extinction deals 20 damage to each creature and each planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The visions haunt me. I see the end of the world, brought on by the search for the Immortal Sun." - Shaper Pashona

property.name: Rules
property.value: Raid - When Storm Fleet Arsonist enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, target opponent sacrifices a permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Go ahead, build another. I'll burn that down as well."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Raid - When Storm Fleet Pyromancer enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, Storm Fleet Pyromancer deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enrage - Whenever Sun-Crowned Hunters is dealt damage, it deals 3 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One alone is dangerous, and they are never alone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a spell from your hand, reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is that spell's mana value. You may cast a spell with mana value X or less from among cards revealed this way without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The pirates of the Brazen Coalition are the descendants of those displaced by the Legion of Dusk, and they are eager for vengeance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control another Dinosaur, Thrash of Raptors gets +2/+0 and has trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They glide through the undergrowth, drawn to sounds of disturbance. They attack in unison and all share in the kill. And then they move on.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Tilonalli's Knight attacks, if you control a Dinosaur, Tilonalli's Knight gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The people of the Sun Empire worship the sun in three aspects. Tilonalli is the Burning Sun, associated with ferocity, fire, and passion.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Whenever Tilonalli's Skinshifter attacks, it becomes a copy of another target nonlegendary attacking creature until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am the ferocity of the Burning Sun. I am hide and feather, fang and claw."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent must attack you or a planeswalker you control with at least one creature each combat if able. At the beginning of your end step, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Unfriendly Fire deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Disputes within the Brazen Coalition can escalate from insult to broadside in the blink of an eye.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (Transforms from Vance's Blasting Cannons.) {T}: Add {R}. {2}{R}, {T}: Spitfire Bastion deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Now instead of a ship, Ripley Vance commands a fortress.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. If it's a nonland card, you may cast that card this turn. Whenever you cast your third spell in a turn, you may transform Vance's Blasting Cannons.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With a broadside assault, Captain Vance carved the cliffs to form her new home.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Wily Goblin enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins climb and swing with ease, whether through a pirate ship's rigging or a tree's branches.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is taller than all but the tallest trees, and older than all but the oldest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach When Atzocan Archer enters the battlefield, you may have it fight another target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His arrows are fletched with feathers from the greatest of the winged dinosaurs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures this turn. Creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I see you, shiny soldiers, but you won't see me."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only force on Ixalan not interested in finding the golden city is Ixalan itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Trample, hexproof

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sun Empire commanders are well versed in advanced martial strategy. Still, the correct maneuver is usually to deploy the giant, implacable death lizard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you feel the ground quake, run. If you hear its bellow, flee. If you see its teeth, it's too late.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Dinosaur or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Legion's conquistadors could endure Ixalan's sun. Their forts could withstand a charging ceratops. But nothing can stop a ceratops strengthened by the sun.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Destroy target creature with flying. • Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not mistake your lofty vantage point for safety." - Shaper Tuvasa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Deathgorge Scavenger enters the battlefield or attacks, you may exile target card from a graveyard. If a creature card is exiled this way, you gain 2 life. If a noncreature card is exiled this way, Deathgorge Scavenger gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Deeproot Champion.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No good will come from what you seek. Turn back now or suffer an ignoble death far from your home."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Deeproot Warrior becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We breathe from our soul and bones to give strength to the jungle. The jungle breathes from its roots and rivers to give strength to us." - Shaper Falani

property.name: Rules
property.value: Drover of the Mighty gets +2/+2 as long as you control a Dinosaur. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not lead. They do not follow. We walk together."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn and must be blocked this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By accepting my smallness I am vast."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Emperor's Vanguard deals combat damage to a player, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Often found browsing on the upper canopies of Ixalan's jungles, whiptails are known to absently bat away anything foolish enough to interrupt their meal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Growing Rites of Itlimoc enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. At the beginning of your end step, if you control four or more creatures, transform Growing Rites of Itlimoc.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (Transforms from Growing Rites of Itlimoc.) {T}: Add {G}. {T}: Add {G} for each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before the Sun Empire was born, humans and merfolk joined their magic to invoke a blessing of fertility on the land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ixalli's Diviner enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {7}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Ixalli's Keeper: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The people of the Sun Empire worship the sun in three aspects. Ixalli is the Verdant Sun, who fosters growth in all things.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) When Jade Guardian enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target Merfolk you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The River Heralds believe that jade gives weight to their magic.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Jungle Delver.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no power too great to be used in the defense of our ancestral lands."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kumena's Speaker gets +1/+1 as long as you control another Merfolk or an Island.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The same power that drives the river ever onward flows through the roots and branches - to me."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Merfolk Branchwalker enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land When New Horizons enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Enchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Old-Growth Dryads enters the battlefield, each opponent may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The jungle was here before any city. It will be here after the last city falls."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The drive to hunt and feed is raw instinct for dinosaurs. The trick is simply to channel it in the right direction.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enrage - Whenever Ranging Raptors is dealt damage, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They cover their territory like a tide of teeth and claws.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enrage - Whenever Ravenous Daggertooth is dealt damage, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A daggertooth's triumphant roar makes all the sounds of jungle life fall silent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enrage - Whenever Ripjaw Raptor is dealt damage, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Raptors are clever enough to tear away a hard metal shell to get at the tasty morsel inside.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and a +1/+1 counter on up to one target Merfolk.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are kin to the trees, and their strength is our own."

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a Dinosaur you control. Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Protection is woven into every vine and branch.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The magic of the River Heralds is so great that even a single shaman can fend off a pirate landing party.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Enrage - Whenever Snapping Sailback is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it. (It must survive the damage to get the counter.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lurking beneath the murky waters of Ixalan's rivers, sailbacks can rip a meal off the shore in the blink of an eye.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spike-Tailed Ceratops can block an additional creature each combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The conquistadors surrounded the dinosaur only to find that it had outflanked them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Dinosaurs you control get +1/+1. {5}{G}: Create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It appears that nature has risen against us." - Captain Brinely Rage

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Tishana's Wayfinder enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, target creature gains "When this creature dies, return it to its owner's hand." Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dryads of the forest have no stake in Ixalan's conflict, but they hate to see any living being suffer.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Verdant Sun's Avatar or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ixalli's fertile rays enliven us all. Each of us is a testament to the sun's strength and love." - Chitlati, Lightning Rider

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Vineshaper Mystic enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target Merfolk you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She has never touched a loom, yet the tapestries she weaves are vast and beautiful.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}{G}{G}: Put X +1/+1 counters on target land you control. That land becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our foes are many and mighty, but not as many as the trees or as mighty as the sea."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control explores, put a +1/+1 counter on Wildgrowth Walker and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hear me, stone, root, branch: be the fist of this land. Turn back those who trample upon your domain." - Song of the Shaper

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Pirates you control get +1/+1. At the beginning of your end step, gain control of target nonland permanent controlled by a player who was dealt combat damage by three or more Pirates this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You and your ship will make a fine addition to my fleet."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Predators try to separate the young, old, or injured from the rest of the herd. The alternative is crushing defeat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create three 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: By the law of church and crown, vampires feed only on the blood of the guilty - those declared heretics, rebels, or enemies of war.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deadeye Plunderers gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control. {2}{U}{B}: Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Keep your friends close and your enemies within range."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Dire Fleet Captain attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other attacking Pirate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Orcs are happiest under captains who steer toward battle. Orcs of the Dire Fleet are downright jovial.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance, trample, haste Whenever Gishath, Sun's Avatar deals combat damage to a player, reveal that many cards from the top of your library. Put any number of Dinosaur creature cards from among them onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Hostage Taker enters the battlefield, exile another target creature or artifact until Hostage Taker leaves the battlefield. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast that spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: You gain life equal to the greatest power among creatures you control. [0]: Create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample. −X: Huatli, Warrior Poet deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures. Creatures dealt damage this way can't block this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Raid - At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Raging Swordtooth enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each other creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Carnivorous dinosaurs developed a taste for undead flesh, tracking the vampires by the scent of blood on their breath.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Dinosaurs you control have haste. When Regisaur Alpha enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Seeing a pack of these monsters hunt together, I'm at a loss to imagine the size of their prey." - Adrian Adanto of Lujio

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. {2}{U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shapers adapt nature to fit their needs and then return it to the way it was, leaving no trace of their passing.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wherever the Threefold Sun shines, great wings may go." - Emperor Apatzec Intli III

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tishana, Voice of Thunder's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. You have no maximum hand size. When Tishana enters the battlefield, draw a card for each creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance, lifelink {T}, Pay 7 life: Destroy target nonland permanent. Activate only during your turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For four hundred years, I have led armies of conquest. These lands hold nothing that can stand against me."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Create a 2/2 black Pirate creature token with menace. −3: Destroy target artifact, creature, or enchantment. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") −1[0]: Target player's life total becomes 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has flying. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: (Transforms from Conqueror's Galleon.) {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. {4}, {T}: Draw a card. {6}, {T}: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Conqueror's Galleon attacks, exile it at end of combat, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control. Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Dowsing Dagger enters the battlefield, target opponent creates two 0/2 green Plant creature tokens with defender. Equipped creature gets +2/+1. Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you may transform Dowsing Dagger. Equip {2}

property.name: Rules
property.value: (Transforms from Dowsing Dagger.) {T}: Add three mana of any one color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The pirates had ventured into the interior for treasure. They found something far greater.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It loomed up over the horizon, silent and dark as a grave.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Elaborate Firecannon doesn't untap during your untap step. {4}, {T}: Elaborate Firecannon deals 2 damage to any target. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may discard a card. If you do, untap Elaborate Firecannon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pirates you control get +1/+0. Whenever Fell Flagship deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The River Heralds fight to keep all others from reaching the golden city. The city has its own defenses.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Hierophant's Chalice enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the Rite of Redemption, nobles take the same vows as Elenda, the first vampire, and make the same eternal sacrifice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Pillar of Origins enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Pirate's Cutlass enters the battlefield, attach it to target Pirate you control. Equipped creature gets +2/+1. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a charge counter on Primal Amulet. Then if there are four or more charge counters on it, you may remove those counters and transform it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (Transforms from Primal Amulet.) {T}: Add one mana of any color. When that mana is spent to cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +1/+0. Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sentinel Totem enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) {T}, Exile Sentinel Totem: Exile all graveyards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control explores, put a +1/+1 counter on Shadowed Caravel. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The pirates had left the open sea behind, but they were still in their element: reckless adventure.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Sorcerous Spyglass enters the battlefield, look at an opponent's hand, then choose any card name. Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (Transforms from Thaumatic Compass.) {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Untap target attacking creature an opponent controls and remove it from combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. At the beginning of your end step, if you control seven or more lands, transform Thaumatic Compass.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Clearly, it indicates the aetheric azimuth of . . ." - Jace Beleren

property.name: Rules
property.value: (Transforms from Treasure Map.) {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice a Treasure: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Half the treasure is the glory of finding it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Scry 1. Put a landmark counter on Treasure Map. Then if there are three or more landmark counters on it, remove those counters, transform Treasure Map, and create three Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Vanquisher's Banner enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1. Whenever you cast a creature spell of the chosen type, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dragonskull Summit enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the Planeswalker Angrath called dinosaurs "dragons," the name stuck in certain pirate circles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: None can tell how many vessels are tangled up on the sea floor - or how much treasure remains unclaimed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Field of Ruin: Destroy target nonbasic land an opponent controls. Each player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield, then shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Glacial Fortress enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ships blown north in their voyage across the Stormwreck Sea become trapped in the unmelting ice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rootbound Crag enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cliffs echo and branches quake at the roar of life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sunpetal Grove enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or a Plains. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the Sun Empire, any place where daylight brightens the jungle floor is sacred ground.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Unclaimed Territory enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just imagine what's waiting around the bend. Adventure. Discovery. Riches for the taking. This is why I sail." - Captain Lannery Storm

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Draw a card. [+1]: Untap all creatures you control. −9: Gain control of up to three target creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Castaway's Despair enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to two target creatures to their owner's hand. Search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Jace, Ingenious Mind-Mage, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you searched your library this way, shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control a Jace planeswalker, Jace's Sentinel gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We drove the Sun Empire out of the forest long ago, and we will not let them return."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Woodland Stream enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Countless streams flow into the nine rivers, and the nine rivers flow into the Great River. The River Heralds guard them all.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target Dinosaur you control. −3: Target Dinosaur you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control. −7: Dinosaurs you control get +4/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't make the mistake of thinking blunt horns can't kill.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. If you control a Huatli planeswalker, that creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Run like the wind, fierce one. The hunt has begun."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sun-Blessed Mount enters the battlefield, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Huatli, Dinosaur Knight, reveal it, then put it into your hand. If you searched your library this way, shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Huatli chooses a mount, its eyes glow with the flames of the sun.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Stone Quarry enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Sun Empire's cities are built from the bones of the earth.
